title: Kids store 1.5 megabytes of information to master their native language

title_detail.value: Kids store 1.5 megabytes of information to master their native language

summary: Learning one's native language may seem effortless. But new research suggests that language acquisition between birth and 18 is a remarkable feat of cognition, rather than something humans are just hardwired to do.

summary_detail.value: Learning one's native language may seem effortless. But new research suggests that language acquisition between birth and 18 is a remarkable feat of cognition, rather than something humans are just hardwired to do.
